alert.note: Alert for Cheatham; Robertson; Sumner (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 22 at 8:59AM CST until February 22 at 9:45AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Sumner County in Middle Tennessee... Northeastern Cheatham County in Middle Tennessee... Robertson County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 945 AM CST. * At 858 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Coopertown, or 12 miles north of Ashland City, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gallatin, Springfield, Goodlettsville, White House, Millersville, Greenbrier, Coopertown, Ridgetop, Cross Plains, Portland, Pleasant View, Orlinda, Cedar Hill, Mitchellville, Black Jack and Cottontown. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 99 and 121. Interstate 24 between mile markers 18 and 30. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for Middle Tennessee.
